project_abstract.cdata: The project consists of the construction of an ammonia/urea plant at Laranjeiras, Sergipe, with a manufacturing capacity of 907 metric tons per day; an adjacent plant to manufacture urea, with a capacity of 1,100 metric tons per day; provision for bagging the entire urea output and facilities for storage and transportation of ammonia and urea.
